comment.author: 8793648@N06
comment._content: Sydney Harbour Bridge opening procession with lots of interesting sights. Goodyear tyre sign on the right but we're trying to figure out the faded sign on buiding in the centre with the flag flying. Looks like CLEMERT'S TONIC Nature's Great Remedy

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/8793648@N06] I think it is "CLEMENTS TONIC".  There are many references in Trove for this cure-all.

comment.author: 18901029@N00
comment._content: I wonder who the band was.

comment.author: 8793648@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the CLEMENTS info. I probably remembered it (if incorrrectly) from my trawl through 20s and 30s issues of the Sydney Mail.
